title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.15 - Tool and equipment control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7306.15 - Tool and equipment control

State Regulations
(a) The director shall implement and maintain
a system to provide for the control, tracking and storage of tools, culinary
equipment and medical equipment. Such system shall include regular monitoring
by the director, or designee. (b) Written records of such system shall be maintained and shall include: (1)
the name of the staff monitoring
compliance; (2)
the date of
monitoring; (3)
the condition of
the tools, culinary equipment and medical equipment; and
(4)
action taken to repair or replace any
tools, culinary equipment and medical equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7306.15

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
